content.question: The size of a population of fish in a pond is modeled by the function <math alttext="P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, where <math alttext="P of t" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> gives the number of fish and <math alttext="t" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> gives the number of years after the first year of introduction of the fish to the pond for <math alttext="0 less than or equal to t, less than or equal to 10" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>. The graph of the function <math alttext="P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and the line tangent to <math alttext="P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> at <math alttext="t equals 4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> are shown above. Which of the following gives the best estimate for the instantaneous rate of change of <math alttext="P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> at <math alttext="t equals 4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: The slope of the line joining <math alttext="open parenthesis, 0 comma, P of 0, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><mi>P</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="open parenthesis, 4 comma, P of 4, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><mi>P</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

The slope of the line joining <math alttext="open parenthesis, 0 comma, P of 0, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><mi>P</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="open parenthesis, 8 comma, P of 8, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><mi>P</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

The slope of the line joining <math alttext="open parenthesis, 3.9 comma, P of 3.9, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mstyle><mrow><mn>3.9</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>P</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>3.9</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle><mo>)</mo></mrow></math> and <math alttext="open parenthesis, 4.1 comma, P of 4.1, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4.1</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><mi>P</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4.1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: The slope of the line joining <math alttext="open parenthesis, 3.9 comma, P of 3.9, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mstyle><mrow><mn>3.9</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>P</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>3.9</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle><mo>)</mo></mrow></math> and <math alttext="open parenthesis, 4.1 comma, P of 4.1, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4.1</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><mi>P</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4.1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 1.1: Introducing Calculus - Can Change Occur at an Instant?

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Identify mathematical information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and/or verbal representations.
